name: Mat
review: Takes care of the shine all day long.

name: Lexi
review: As a powder over foundation

name: Angella
review: I do not use the applicator it comes with.  I usr a face brush to apply on face.

name: Megan
review: I love this powder!! It is such an easy, lightweight add to any look. It controls my shine very well. I've been using it for about a year now!

name: Rachel
review: I like this product overall, I think I'll buy this again.

name: len
review: This product is very light and covers well.

name: Chrissy
review: While the applicator that came with it was kind of cool, the product itself fell flat.

name: Lynn
review: Highly recommend this product.  I've been using since high school and always recommend it to friends.

name: BEC
review:
I have been using this powder for years. I have tried others, more expensive ones and cheaper ones, and I always come back to this one.
It looks natural.

name: Shelly
review: didn't like it, too heavy, too dark

name: NYCgal91
review: This product is good but I just wish they had more shades. Its very light weight and that what I love about it. I use this on top of my foundation and concealer for shine control and it does it job. I'm not sure if i will repurchase this product again maybe if Revlon comes out with more shades.

name: Taylor
review: This powder is amazing! It's a great price and makes my complexion look fantastic. I just wish it stayed on longer without needing to be reapplied (it does NOT last 16 hours like advertised. It's usually gone by the end of my 8 hour shift, so I reapply every 4 hours and it's fine. But I also have oily skin, so maybe ladies with normal skin will have a longer lasting finish!)

name: Em
review: I haven't been able to find anything to control the shine on some parts of my face while not drying out or flaking the rest of my face. This product worked awesomely.

name: Jenn
review: I had this powder this past summer and I enjoyed it but then I ran out. I have been using another powder lately, but I decided to try this one again. I was very excited to get it, remembering my past experience with it during the summer. However, this time it was so drying that it made my skin feel so tight and dry and awful looking even with a light moisturizer underneath!! This powder is great for the hot summer months, but it does  not work well in the winter months ... at least not for my skin type anyway and I have pretty oily skin. I chose "no I would not recommend this to a friend" at the bottom simply because I have found powders that work well both during the summer and winter months and this one does not.

name: Proud to be a Christian
review: I had bought some expensive prestige powder foundation but it did not last as long as I had hoped and it was expensive.  I thought I would try something cheaper.  I am extremely pleased with the coverage and how long it lasts throughout the day as well as how long it lasts in general.

name: Sam
review: I would totally recommend this, there just isn't much actual powder in the tray as i expected.

name: Andrea
review: The product covered, but since I have skin on the dry side, it did not cover any dry patches at all. Most do this well, but this one did not at all

name: sk
review: I have combination skin and this worked very well controlling the oil without drying me out.

name: fatgirl
review: i bought this and it was to light. will be in to buy another shade

name: ladytgirl
review: I love this product. It is long lasting and well worth the money.

name: J
review: Ive been using this product for about a year now, and i love it! It looks flawless and it makes my skin look so natural! I higly recommend this! :)

name: Sabi
review: As a base before the powder

name: Ms P
review: Use with or without foundation

name: Carrie
review: Love it!!

name: Jenny from the woods
review:
Love this over their oil/combo foundation.
Stays nice all day with slight blotting.

name: Bobbie
review: Controls the shine.

name: Tabby T
review: I love it!

name: Amylyn
review: Absolutely the best pressed powder for beauty on a budget !

name: Truly
review: Everyday wear

name: Mary
review: Luv it

name: Peetie
review:
I have been a loyal buyer with a different long-time retailer for years- they have a fantastic powder foundation but I also have been looking for a long time for something comparable but less expensive. I finally found it in this! No need for any liquid foundation first-this does two jobs at once. And, at less than half the price of what I had been paying.
I do have to apply more often- few times in the a.m. and again in the p.m. and I use different (actually better) sponges to apply this. That would be the only negative- the round soft pad to apply is very flimsy and does not make it go on as well- use a better sponge for better results.
I would definitely recommend this.

name: Beauty pro
review: It looks like a different color once it's applied

name: BB
review: Love how it lasts all day. Works like foundation without feeling cakey.

name: livinggeekchic
review: This is pretty nice powder. I think I like their PhotoReady one a little better though. The color on this one is just a little too dark and seems to go on heavier. But, it's still good--I certainly won't return it, I'll use it up.

name: Miss Autumn
review: I use this powder to set my foundation and concealer...doesnt crease if powder is applied generously

name: On the Go
review: good product for acne-prone, sensitive skin because it is oil-free and talc free.  I use the translucent color to set foundation or tinted moisturizer.  I use the medium if I'm only wearing powder.  I have fair skin and the Light was too light.  Maybe it will work in the winter when I'm not tan, but you may want to go a shade darker than you would usually buy.

name: s11
review:
I bought this as I'm a fan of Revolon's Colorstay Foundation. I thought this would be a good powder but it's didn't impress me.
I did like that it's not yellow or ashy like many powders on the market. When I put the powder on, you couldn't even tell I was wearing it.
That being said, it didn't control my oiliness nor did I feel like it helped set my makeup in for longer.
Not a bad product but I'm still searching for something that will actually help control my shine and set my makeup.

name: Meggles
review: I use it as a foundation. I do not think it lasts 16 hours, but the texture is soft and lightweight and it lasts longer than any other I have tried.

name: AmirsMama
review: The only pro is its a little too light, but some bronzer fixes that. this formula is pretty good.

name: Luna
review: Do not use this powder if what you want is coverage you'll only end up looking caked and unnatural. However, it is perfect as a finishing powder. Just dust lightly over your foundation and it"ll make your makeup LAST FOREVER. No matter what foundation or tinted moisturizer I used underneath it it stays put.

name: Danie
review: I have used  Estee Lauder double wear and this compares great to it !!!

name: Mom
review: It is nice every day use

name: Pat
review: This powder goes very well with the foundation of the same name.  I was very happy with my purchase.

name: Angie
review: Awesome product

name: Susie
review: I like the coverage and feel of this product, but the color is very inconsistent. For example, I have two of these pressed powders in the same shade of "Pale", but just by looking at them there is a noticeable difference in shades, almost as if they were mislabeled.

name: Nelly
review: Amazing coverage for the price.

name: shower
review: Lasts all day and light feeling

name: gela the designer
review: this is a nice little product that I would buy again, like that it has a mirror in it as well, that was a suprise

name: Eyes need help
review: Great quality

name: sundaisy0879
review: It has good coverage. Shows my fine lines and pires though.

name: Amanda
review: Nothing special. Very light coverage

name: Kaynasw
review: Seriously love this! Matches my skin tone perfectly and I can't get enough of it:) I can touch up during the day doesn't get Cakey looks natural.

name: Michelle
review: The coverage is not as full as I would like.  I tried this one because the same brand in liquid foundation is great.  The powder version does not cover as well.  Would be good as a back up touch up powder in your purse.

name: Mrs. H
review: Keeps  my face oil free and Matte for hours, lightweight and comfortable with no touch ups necessary!!

name: Hannah
review: Truly lasts all day long and provides great coverage. I've been using this product and matching foundation for years. Great bang for your buck with awesome coverage.

name: Kitty
review: I have combination skin and this powder isn't that bad at controlling the shine I get on my nose and forehead. It goes on a little heavy but otherwise it's pretty good for the price.

name: makeup lover
review: use on face to cover blemishes and help get tone to skin

name: meaghan
review: Great coverage for me. If you have dry skin, use moisterizer beforehand. This is my go to face powder.

name: satisfied client
review: Good makeup

name: Cyb
review: I use it over liquid cover up as extra coverage. I use a matte liquid cover up but I still get shiny at the end of the day. I believe that is my own skin problem, not either cover ups. I've bought six so far. matches my skin color well.

name: hogwild
review: I bought it because I wanted a more natural looking finish than the loose powder I was using and I love it....

name: Tarah
review: I am 25 with combo/sensitive-ish skin. This hasn't gave my skin any problems. It does not control shine for long, I feel I need to reapply, but I havent found a powder or anything to take away the shine without over drying/flacking my skin. I feel a soft powder brush works best, applicator good for on the go

name: Mandy in TX
review: Would not buy again

name: none
review: Daily with foundaton makeup

name: Sarah
review:
I have been using this powder for years, I feel that it works great. I personally use it as a setting powder in conjunction with my Revlon foundation, and it works really well. I would not use it alone however, because much like any powder, it's not a miracle product. Makeup is best done in stages/layers, and there isn't any one product by itself that will make a tremendous difference--it's a combination of multiple items, in my opinion. It's a very lightweight powder, and for my skin tone (extremely pale), it matches well.

Overall---a good buy!

name: justashopper
review: Na

name: makeup lover
review: not sure why but council bluffs store had medium but one on 120 and l in omaha never does . only light or dark so i have to go to council bluffs always now which limits my visits

name: dja1a
review: I bought this after reading reviews that it was a pretty good department store powder but this stuff is just terrible. It doesn't blend and just looks like powder sitting on my skin. It accentuates any flake of dry skin on my face and makes my skin look dried out and aged even though I have somewhat oily skin, not a good look at all.

name: ma
review:
I tan easily and want one product that will "adapt" to a degree to changing amount of color of tan as season progresses. Do not like heavy coverage. Use brush instead of applicator that came with this product because I could control amount (more in spots near hairline for example) and less on rest of face. Also was able to brush lightly around eyes which are most sensitive area with no adverse effect.
Could not find a problem with it and I have sensitive, dry skin and do not like obvious heavy makeup. This product took care of every problem.

name: SJE
review: My goto.

name: beautylover
review: This powder offers little coverage but is not to disguise pores, minor blemishes and redness. It keeps me matte for 5 hours till I have to blot my face. It touches up well too. This is one of my new favorite everyday powders!

name: Andrea
review: Perfect!

name: no cake face
review: I purchased for oil control.  It was light and blended easily but the deep color was truly not deep in color.

name: Makeupfreak
review: I recently bought this product for the good price of $9.99. I loved the price and was excited to use it. The shades of the product are a little complicating. For me I was between light and fair. I ended up buying both just to see which was better. After using this product I love the fact that it covers my Slight acne (not much, not big). It also covers the red hue my cheeks tend to have. One thing I love is that my face stays shine free all day. Trust me I HATE a shiny face. So overall I really like this product and think its a good buy for the price.

name: Margie
review: I liked this product plenty but it didn't blow me away as anything amazing.  A better than average drugstore powder.

name: caroline
review: great product. full coverage.

name: JewelyBee
review: I have never used pressed powder before. I noticed that with my routing of using only foundation...my face just looked flat and gross by the end of the day. I usually splurge on Urban Decay and other pricey cosmetics but was in a pinch to try some powder. I really like this stuff minus the fact that there aren't really that many shades to work with. My skin is bronze and anything I use on it has to have hints of yellow. This stuff LOOKS amazing in indoor lighting but outside it makes my face about a shade lighter than my neck. That could be my own fault for not opting for another powder closer to my skin but that aside, the finish is fantastic for the price.

name: Karen
review: I use this with a blurring brush to keep it light and it works great. The pad that comes with it can make it a bit thick.

name: asr300
review: I love this powder. I always use a liquid foundation prior to my powder. This powder is very natural as long as you don't over do it. I notice it setting in creases every once in a while.

name: Ana
review: Was using it to set my foundation and it was just okay, controled my shine well but looked a little cakey. After a few days i ended up breaking out really badly, cystic acne bad, so i had to stop using.

name: Allergic Reaction
review: I was looking for a good replacement for my Mac Studio Fix Pressed Powder foundation since I had no desire to spend $28 every time I needed a new compact. After searching numerous forums, Revlon ColorStay Pressed Powder was the most suggested/reviewed product as an equivalent replacement. While the powder went on beautifully, my face began breaking out within 3 hours of application. (This was the only new thing introduced, be it makeup, food, soap, etc.) I attributed it to hormonal acne and tried it again a few days later--same results. Two weeks after the initial application and I'm left with horrible Cystic Folliculitis all over my face. My forehead is riddled, my cheeks to my "sideburns" are awful, and my nose to my chin is so splotchy! It's horrible!!! Revlon is also one of the major "drugstore" makeup brands (along with L'Oreal) that has so many reactions to their products. Just please be careful what you put on your face!

name: Anita
review: Light powder

name: Riss
review: I love this, i went from using a high end powder and tried this. I won't go back! It makes my skin look so natural with a beautiful finish. It also has a light coverage as well

name: Deborah
review: Best coverage for the price

name: Sara
review: I actually use this for a bronzer and it works great. I have light skin, sensitive skin and this works well for me.

name: DRandall
review: Great for a quick shine cover!  Blends well.

name: wanderlust
review: My face gets really sweaty, and my concealer always used to crease under the eye. I asked someone at ULTA what to do about this, and she recommended this product to me. I swear by it, and love how long-lasting it is. I don''t condone sleeping with makeup onn, but I've done it before with this on and I lilteralliy woke up flawless.

name: Lydia
review: I use this product every single day and I love it.

name: Angela
review: I usually wear L'Oreal. Not sure why I even purchased this. It's cakes up. No natural coverage what so ever.

name: Meli
review: I love using this powder, I have oily skin and it tames it pretty well!

name: BB
review: Great coverup without looking all made-up-- very natural looking.

name: rylotru
review: good

name: Queenie36
review: I read all the hype about what great coverage this had and I was disappointed. I dont think its the best powder to finish my make up with. Its ok but not worth the money or the hype.

name: Shelly
review: Great for oily skin.  Have spent a fortune on foundations and powders that have not worked nearly as well as this line!

name: Mona
review: Good product for me. Been using for years.

name: txgold
review: In the store the color looked right but when I was at home in natural light the color made me look pale even though it was the darkest shade the offered.  So sad about it because I have used the Revlon Colorstay Mineral powder and it worked well but this time I was looking for more of a matte look and unfortunately they don't offer my shade. I ended up returning it.

name: medic
review: Very satisfied with this product.

name: Panda2012
review: This is an ok product. Its great when you first put it on but once your mid day you can see it in my creases under my eyes and since my skin is on the oily side, that starts to shine through as well.
It worked great for me, I have oily skin and it was perfect although it didn't last all day which was fine but it did control my oily skin a lot!!

name: demar4244
review: This was not the best powder for me. I have very oily skin, but this powder was a bit too matte for me, un-natural looking, if you will. It also didn't deliver on it's 16 hour shine free promise. It lasted about 4-5 hours before I was oily and needed to blot.

name: Jordyn
review: I've tried this product with numerous different powder brushes, a kabuki, stippling brushes... It's just not that great. It's okay for a quick makeup fix but I have acne and I need great coverage.

name: Mom
review: I love this product and use regularly.

name: Jpeffley
review: I use this with my colorstay foundation and it works really well. It doesn't leave my skin looking powdery or cakey. I use a big fluffy brush to apply it and it works really well and stays for a long time.

name: Rachelle
review: I use this powder over my foundation and concealer to set it. Coverage is perfect and it controls shine well. I tend to be on the shiny side so this is the best product for me!

name: BEC
review: Use this product every day.

name: xokimmy
review: I would recommend this product to everyone. It goes on very easily, no caking and settling in creases, and blends really well. And it's relatively cheap!

name: Sonia
review: I really like using this product. I have purchased the MAC equivalent and they are pretty much the same to me. Obviously MAC has better ingredients and is better quality, but the look of both products on my skin looks the same.

name: GirlUncommon
review: I tried a pricey brand's long lasting powder and loved it, but was looking for a less expensive alternative - and found it in this product!  It's doesn't look cakey and covers minor imperfections well.  It doesn't settle into creases and best of all it lasts a long time.  I usually can go all day at work without a touch up - other products I would look like I had nothing on by lunch. This is my go to daily finishing powder.

name: makeup lover
review:
going out and after a meal i readd
looking less pale as i cant tan

name: TLR
review: love this product

name: milky way the cat
review: i bought this to set my under eye concealer. now i just use it as an all over face power because it looked weird on top of my concealer but works great as an all over face powder.

name: Fishgoddess
review: I needed a change from loose powder & I think I found a good replacement.
It has a powdery finish that I didn't like. I didn't even give it a chance to see if it lasts long, but the chances didn't look good.

name: Fighting50
review: Insert everyday to blend my blush a little and on my lips to make my lip liner go on smoothly!

name: Hscott
review: This light weight finshing powder was perfect to apply over my liquid foundation to set the makeup.  It doesn't dry out my face and doesn't cake on.  My goal always is to appear that I'm not wearing any makeup on even and this finshing powder does just that! Perfect for what I needed

name: Smarts
review: Covers well, gives matte finish

name: vanille latte
review: to cover up the oils on my face.

name: G~
review:
I love the light weight M-F make-up that the name brand's can't give me. This is perfect for office to home and inbetween! Give it a try, you'll love it..
G~

name: Margie
review: I use it to finish my makeup

name: Bailee
review: I dab this powder over the areas I used concealer to keep the concealer from creasing. It's great. No matter the skin color, I would recommend the light powder. It blends well with concealer and highlights as well. It's not too light.

name: Ree
review: Use this product to set make up after foundation is applied.Works very well.

name: Jess
review: I use this product on top of my Revlon ColorStay foundation and I love it. The shade is a little bit darker than expected so I bought the light color even though my skin is more medium toned. I love it. It helps keep my makeup looking great all day long.

name: Madhatton
review: The powder was fine enough, however the applicator it comes with will turn your face black, I ended up looking like I have a Bob's burgers mustache.

name: Lisha
review: Bought this because I they were out of photo ready powder. Very pleased. May stay with this powder.

name: Rach
review: Light coverage, controls oily areas

name: Hairstylist
review: This product is great!  It's the only powder that I use!

name: Y. Gayle
review: Since I don't wear makeup, I use this product as my foundation.

name: Revlon fan
review: Best powder ever--do not need foundation other than this!

name: Zee
review: I love this product. I have been using it for years. It is a must have for me.

name: Ladybeader
review: Using this powder for the first time. I like it fine.

name: Mary
review: I never buy any other powder than this one

name: Funny Maria
review: Although I haven't used this product much since I bought it, I was pleased with the quality of my new ColorStay Pressed Powder. I will definitely be using this once I finish my old pressed powder. Good quality at a reasonable price.

name: Lindsey
review: Love to set my reckon 24 hour color stay liquid foundation with this!

name: Jordan Hair And Makeup Services
review: I use this powder to set my foundation. It's great for blending and setting everything!

name: Jennifer
review: I brush the product on

name: Inspiring
review: I use this in the morning over my moisturizer on cleansed face.  Powder goes on smoothly, absorbs oil,does not cake up and leaves complexion looking silky smooth reapplying only once for the day. It is non drying and looks very natural.

name: Texasgrl27
review: Revlon is usually one of my top choices in beauty/ hair products, but this powder was much too drying and very poor coverage.

name: Kris
review: It is good for being cheap

name: AV
review: Best powder

name: Katie
review: I use this product almost every day it it really stays in for a long time. I love the  applier it comes with but my skin is really oily so it does not help with that.

name: pinkglamxoxo
review: I love this! i shoulf of gotten 1 shade darker though

name: jennys
review: Love that it works with my oily skin!

name: KB
review: It covers well and its long lasting. No need to reapply.

name: Kitten
review: Another great product from Revlon. Doesn't have bad chemical smell, which I can't stand. Revlon never disappoints! Love it.

name: Jan the Walker
review: I use this product daily with a bronzer over it. Fast & easy to apply

name: jessd6
review: the powder claims to mattify and control shine for up to 16 hours. within moments of putting it on, it appeared cakey and settled into my pores, making them even more noticeable. i returned this compact immediately.

name: Brit
review: I bought this because I use the Colorstay for oily/normal skin and needed something to control the shine in the humidity/hot weather.  I love it.  It goes on really well without smudging my foundation around and matches the Ivory #110 foundation perfectly.  I sometimes have a problem with foundations/powders that look too orange on my fair skin but these products work for me, even better than the various expensive foundations I've tried.

name: fairy
review: The compact has a very small mirror . Miss the old dispenser. also,the new application pad rips after first few uses.although I like the powder, I don't like the dispenser.

name: peewee's mom
review: keep changing the shades so its hard to fine a repeat of a past purchase that i loved.  The bottom compartment is unnesscessary, always oppening to that instead of the powder compartment.  The shade that i purchased in the past was light/medium.  The replacement shade was much lighter.

name: AleighLo
review: I like this pressed powder. Lightweight, yet buildable. I usually use it to set my foundation but will also use it alone to not feel so naked on a lazy day. I didn't care for the applicator. It kind of has rough edges so if you're applying near the under eye area, beware.

name: Kayla
review: I absolutely love Revlon ColorStay liquid foundation, so I decided to give this product a try. First thing I noticed was the smell... I understand that sometimes make-up has acne medication smells, but this one did not have it in it, nor did it smell like that certain "acne product" smell. I can't pinpoint it exactly, but it does not smell good at all. Next, when I put it on, I could see the powder laying on my face. It was not good coverage at all and after about a week of using it, my skin broke out. I would not recommend this product at all if you have oily skin, sensitive skin, and want any coverage at all. The liquid foundation though? It's awesome.

name: Babay the babay
review: I bought this thinking it would be a great product but i was not quite as happy as i had hoped. It dosent cover much at all. It will control the shine but only for a short while and when i reapply it it looks cakey. I still use it everyday just because i don't want it to go to waste but i have to use other powders on top to make it work.

name: Barb
review: Easy to apply and I like the coverage. Just the shiny nose issue would be a bit negative.

name: Lauren
review: This is a great powder! My only complaint is that the puff they give you to apply it isn't very great. I've used a sponge instead and then it covers great!

name: MissMay
review: Here's the thing with this, I am a medium skin tone, and it is just too light for my skin, which was really disappointing , but when I put this over my foundation, and then go over it with a darker powder it seems to work just fine. I would have picked a shade darker. Overall, not impressed, and won't be repurchasing because it's just nothing special.

name: Vicki
review: At first I was dismayed there was not a loose powder in this line.  However, it turned out that was not a problem.  This powder tranfers easily to the applicator and applies very nicely.  This wasn't my correct color but I purchased it during a sale and plan to exchange it when my local store gets more Revlon in stock as they were wiped-out.

name: Amanda
review: Works great on my oily skin!

name: Happy customer
review: Great coverage without looking heavy. Accurate color match. Stays looking fresh.

name: pinehillgirl
review: Being in a hurry this morning, I applied this powder over my moisturizer with a big fluffy brush.  It went on well and provided just enough coverage so that I did not look too bare.  It was a bit messy, but that may be due to the size of the brush I used.  I tried to be more careful when I realized I had powder spilling over to the side of the compact.  If you are fair like me and simply want to take away the unmade look of your face for a quick trip out in public, this powder should work.  Next time I will try it over liquid foundation and see how it works.  Enjoy!

name: Deb
review: The case is hard to open.  The puff is foam and does not apply the product well.

name: Schmell1
review: I use this over my foundation

name: Blair
review: I use this powder to set the revlon colorstay foundation.

name: Sam
review: Apply like any other pressed powder and go

name: Neshia
review: Somehow this color no longer matches and there was not a color on the rack that would blend better.

name: Dianix
review: I liked it, the texture is wonderful

name: Susan
review: Great

name: RED
review: i gave me a flawless finish

name: caprine1
review: Product works as good as any other face powder

name: Jan
review: I use this product over my foundation and it gives nice coverage without looking caked on. I do use a different applicator than the one that came with it. It seemed to absorb the product  too much.

name: Shawnda
review: I use this product everyday. I get so many compliments from my husband and kids. I'm stopped by people walking by me and they stop, ask me about my make up. My face is flawless and fresh looking all day. It's not heavy, don't clog pores, match my skin perfectly, blend well and I do not have to blot or reapply through out the day. Going through menapause, after I blot my face, my face is still fresh and flawless

name: Anne
review: This is my favorite pressed powder, and I've tried several at higher price points. It offers great, long-lasting coverage.

name: Emily
review: This is a quick powder that makes your face look a little too powdered for my liking.  After about an hour it evens out and looks much better though.  I do find myself applying it halfway through the day again to get rid of oil.

name: Blk
review: This product works extremely well over makeup. I would not wear this without a foundation on my skin first becuase of the light conceal it offers. The product provides a fantastic finish to any makeup look, and the color blends easily.

name: SCGal
review: I love this powder. Teamed with the foundation, I get all day shine control. I use sparingly around my eyes because no matter what powder you use, it does settle into fine lines and can really highlight these little imperfections if you are not careful.

name: Garciagurl
review: I was looking for a setting powder.  I always have trouble finding a color match.  The matches pretty well, but I don't think this keeps me matte through out the day.  It probably lasts about 4-5 hrs.  I'm not as oily in the winter and thought it would last a lot longer.

name: Beth
review: This is a good powder.  Sets makeup well.  I just didn't feel like it was anything special.  Worth a try but you could probably find something cheaper for less money.  I bought it at 40% off! otherwise! I don't think I would pay full price for this

name: makeupluver
review: Stays on all day! No re-applying just make sure you blot thought the day and you'll be fine. Blends great

name: Judie the senior citizen
review: When I find a product that works well I stay with it. I get many compliments on my complexion and I'm 71 years old.

name: missy
review: i really like this powder

name: Shell
review: I like this powder even better than a lot of the prestige powders that I've tried.  It controls shine all day (I have very oily skin) and adds just enough coverage over my liquid foundation to give me a smooth, even skintone.  It's long-lasting as well.

name: scubagal70
review: I really love this powder.  It goes on easily and looks very natural.   The only cons are that the powder puff is underneath the powder and its a little hard to get to and also, there is only a half mirror.  I prefer a full mirror.  But these are not issues that will keep me from buying this product again.

name: Mvbree
review: Applied with a brush, it goes on well.

name: pinkglamxoxo
review: Love this powder

name: bleuorchid21
review: I have fairly decent skin so I don't really wear foundation. I use this to help control the shine on my forehead caused by my combination skin. I also use it as a setting powder for my concealer. It works well but most of the time, my forehead still gets shiny and oily in far less than 16 hours time.

name: budget buyer
review: For the price and touch ups thru out the day it is perfect.

name: LK
review: natural look

name: Beryl Arianne
review: I've tried lots of different kinds of foundations but this one has worked the best for me. It doesn't make me break out, it's not too cakey but it's not too sheer. The colours is a little pale, but I use bronzer to rectify that. I've tried Lancome and MAC foundation matched to my skin tone, and this one works better and is less expensive.

name: bebefio
review: I have pale skin with some random freckling.  This softened the freckles without being too heavy or gathering in the creases.  I wear many disposable face masks during the day and it seems to stay on well.  I rarely see it on the mask when I take them off.  I really like the product!

name: Yaya
review: Great coverage, works exactly as advertised. Only need to apply once per day for lovely coverage.

name: Laura
review: This product does not under any circumstances last for 15 hours like it says.... I am shiny a couple hours after applying. The price is good the color looks natural I love it when it's fresh just not the way it wears through the day

name: Christine
review: I have been usI got it for years and love it

name: Amanda D.
review: Though I'm otherwise a budget buyer, I will spend more for good solid makeup. This is upper mid tier and does look great for day to day use.

name: Honey
review: Love it!

name: Karen
review: Love it

name: Alix Lola
review: I have dry sensitive skin that can easily get irritated, so I've stayed away from powder forever, but I recently discovered that it can work for me. I need to wear thick greasy moisturizer under my foundation and this powder leaves a silky non-shiny finish. And it lasts all day, which is a big plus. So glad I found this product!

name: signgal
review: Goes on a little heavy with applicator pad. Brush works perfectly and leaves my skin looking flawless and shine-free without a dull matte look.

name: Nina
review: I usually purchase Ulta brand pressed powder, however, as usual, my local Ulta was out of stock I went for this as it was the powder that I was able to grab the quickest. I'm not crazy about it...I use it throughout the day to control shine. Considering the price, id have to say it gets the job done.

name: TBearie
review: Love this powder. Have been using it for over 8 years. All day wear. Love it!

name: Ana
review: sets my makeup really well. Doesn't break me out..love revlon products

name: Alisa
review: Excellent but like any other product ...it will cake if you don't use a light hand. Overall I'm very pleased.

name: Proud to be a Christian
review: I have been looking for something cheaper than the more expensive prestige cosmetics which is hard to do. Mhowever, this works very well for the much cheaper price.

name: cartoongirl
review: I have been using this product for probably over 10 years.  Its the only thing I use as a foundation.  After moisturizing I apply this product all over my face with a brush and that's it.  For me perfect coverage, with none of that icky/heavy/thick feeling that so many other foundations leave.

name: Just a Girl
review: This powder is awesome! I have been using it for 7 years and love it. Nice finish, gentle on my sensitive skin, non-comedogenic, long lasting and keeps my foundation in place. I reapply once if at all during a 10 hour work day.

name: lala123
review:
I tried many drugstore brand pressed powders and never found any that worked great for my very oily skin. This powder has matted my face longer than any I've tried so far. It actually is perfect for my asian skin color.
The packaging could be better, its a bit bulky, and it feels kind of cheap and could break easily in my opinion.

name: biene
review: good coverage, blends well with skin color

name: medic
review: Works good. Been using it for years.

name: PW
review: Carry this in my purse, to use to freshen during the day at work, I use this less often during the day than previous product. It does last longer without creasing.

name: Duffy
review: I wasn't crazy about this product. I was looking for a pressed powder to set my foundation and concealer, but I found that this one sat on top of my skin. It definitely takes away any shine but it made my skin look too powdery and cakey. I wouldn't recommend this product because I think there are better pressed powders out there for the same amount, but it might do ok on an oily skin.

name: rach411
review: Works great when used with the Color Stay Foundation

name: Melissa
review: The light is too light and the next color is too dark. Its kinda chalky but covers well.

name: beans
review: This powder really helps me control shine.

name: Sara
review: i hated this, it was so cakey! i would put it on and it would cake up so fast and it makes me look like im wearing makeup and that i dont know how to apply it. hate hate hate it.

name: Jill the moderator
review: Light and easy to apply evenly.

name: Dezertgem
review: My daughter asked me to try this powder; It is so much better than Mac! I would highly recommend anyone to use this! It lasts, and covers nicely!

name: Amy
review: I buy this compact to put in my purse for a cheap and quick touch up. It not great for everyday wear but since it goes on kind of thick, it covers well. If you spend all day at the office and have an engagement right after, it is perfect to give you that "freshened up" look.

name: MissDaisy
review: I really did like the powder. It wasn't heavy at all. It did take away the shine and left my skin looking soft and silky. I really liked it to where I think I'll continue to buy it instead of my usual department store powder.

name: Hillster
review: Works really well with a makeup brush; not sure how it does with the little puff.

name: Debz
review: It is perfect.  Lasts all day & I know your not supposed to but I sleep in it & it does not clog my pores.  I'm often asked what have I done differently, that I look well rested.

name: Ash
review: I got this because Revlon products were buy 2, get 2 free. I really needed a setting powder-I use it to control the shine with my super oily skin. They didn't have any (I'm still not sure if Revlon even sells setting powder) so I thought I'd try out a power foundation to go over my liquid foundation to help with that. It works surprisingly well. The coverage is pretty good for a powder foundation too. If you're someone that likes a light-medium coverage you would probably like this product alone too.

name: Lena V
review: Very good setting powder, smooth an gorgeous. Keeps you matte.

name: wrenzilla
review:
Great selection of shades to match your complexion.
Long lasting and controls shine.
Great product for a great value price!

name: Mindy
review: Great coverage! Doesn't settlei into fine lines.

name: Kelsey
review: It is a makeup I've used a lot of years.

name: Gran Nan
review: Daily use

name: Jean
review: Its full coverage

name: Carlos
review: The product works great and easy to use when you are in a rush

name: J.P.
review: I've tried several products, including top brand names. Quite frankly, after having to cut down my expenses 3 years ago, I tried this product out (courtesy of my wonderful beautiful awesome mother). I must say, I was rather impressed. I have stuck to this product since and don't plan on switching anytime soon. Can't beat the price either quite frankly!

name: Silver Sterling
review: Nice powder. Leaves a nice matte finish, but not "flat". Lasts all day as long as there's no sweat.

name: Queenfnp
review: I use this product every day. I tend to use a little more I'm going out at night and to keep it a little later during the day especially during the summer.

name: CJ
review: I use it after I apply my liquid foundation and let liquid foundation set

name: Bonn
review: I apply this product, along with the 24hour colorstay foundation from Revlon, at around 6:30am and it lasts well through 4pm. I have oily skin especially around my nose area and I have to say this powder is the best drugstore powder I have used.

name: Amtg82385
review: I have combination skin and after trying the Colorstay foundation, I decided to buy the powder to use for summer when I need some coverage but do not want to wear liquid foundation. I really like this product and think it lasts pretty well for a budget brand product. It usually lasts 7 hrs before I feel like it's wearing off or before I can see shine peeking through.

name: Kate
review: Colorstay liquid foundation and pressed powder are my current go-to. I used to use the big fluffy RT brush to apply powders but it often made the powder to obvious so I use the little foams round application pads and press the powder onto my foundation and vwalaa! Flawless finish.

name: Katymae
review: It works well to take the shine off my oily face.

name: coffeelover1980
review: I have been using this for a couple of months now and I have used this in the past as it does not make me break out. I only wish it had more medium-full coverage and lasted longer. other than that pretty good

name: TP
review: I use the powder over a light liquid foundation. I have pretty clear skin I just like to use powder to get a matte finish and an even tone. This product is great for the price!

name: None
review: Great powder if you want a very matte face.I have oily skin and this tends to dry my skin out especially if I get this around my eye area. I will still keep using this but not sure if I will buy it again.

name: Karen
review: I am used to Bare Mineral, but the store did not have the mineral veil I usually get and I found this.  I was told it would work. NOT!  Back to Bare Minerals

name: Chola
review: Use powder as a base

name: Fab
review: Not natural looking at all

name: luvmesometori
review: I like this item. Currently I'm switching brands so far I like this.

name: MPutter
review: Looking for long wearing makeup.

name: Steph
review: The powder is great it looks really goidbonband definitely has long staying power I still look pretty good even In 100 degree heat when usually it just melts off of me

name: Rosemarygrm
review: used after foundation to set

name: Gillian
review: Normally I go for high end foundation, but I'm glad I gave this a shot.  Perfect color for me, and it controls shine so well! I use it on top of a liquid foundation, so between those two I get great coverage.

name: Dalva
review:
Within 2 hours, my T-zone has became oily. It may be more suitable for normal skin user rather than oily /combination ski user.
Returned to ULTA.

name: Kris the rabbit lover
review:
I use this over a light foundation. Doesn't look like a mask!
It's perfect for keeping my eye makeup neat. Works well for me.
